main event: Two witnesses observed a red metallic oval object with a halo in the sky for about two minutes in Uniontown, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was described as looking oval and red with a shimmering metallic finish,The observers reported seeing two of these objects moving in the sky,The objects were observed for about 2 minutes before fading from view,The witnesses compared the size of the object to a half dollar coin,One sketch showed the object from below and another sketch depicted its sideways movement.
sighted object: red metallic oval object with a halo
witness description: Witnesses described seeing two metallic, shimmering objects moving in the sky.
